title: Extremely verbose logging for CancelledBuild
body:
This test hangs. We haven't been able to figure out why.

Adding as much logging as I can think of -- to stdout, which
will be in the .log file, since the XML results file isn't
created in the hang case.

commit.message:
Extremely verbose logging for CancelledBuild

This test hangs. We haven't been able to figure out why.

Adding as much logging as I can think of -- to stdout, which
will be in the .log file, since the XML results file isn't
created in the hang case.

nodes.body: My plan was merge and wait. If it wasn't such an important scenario I'd just disable the test 😿
